label: 鳥羽殿
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: A residential complex in the Toba area of the present Fushimi-ku, Kyoto; used as a villa by Retired Emperors Shirakawa, Toba, and Go-Shirakawa. [伏見　白河院　鳥羽院　後白河]
